author: Carly Ledbetter
title: Get Ready For More Color In Your Life, Lisa Frank Makeup Is On Its Way
text:
Get Ready For More Color In Your Life, Lisa Frank Makeup Is On Its Way ğŸŒˆ âœ¨ ğŸ’˜ ğŸ‘‘ ğŸ­ By Carly Ledbetter 
Lisa Frank is making our glittery, colorful dreams come true by blessing us with a makeup line . 
The line is a partnership between Lisa Frank and Glamour Dolls Makeup , an indie makeup brand that puts out cruelty-free, vegan cosmetics. Though the project is currently in its Kickstarter phase, itâ€™s already surpassed its funding goal by almost three times the asking amount. 
â€œThe Glamour Dolls makeup line will be the first line that Lisa Frank has done specifically for adults,â€ makeup artist and vlogger Kandee Johnson said in a video about the exciting news. â€œThe line is geared toward that â€˜80s and â€˜90s kid that grew up loving all these fun patterns, colors, prints and characters and wants a little bit more of that in their life.â€ 
The colorful collaboration will reportedly include lip balm, eyeliner, a â€œunicorn lippie,â€ matte mousse foundation, highlighter and vegan makeup bag, according to the Kickstarter page . 
For people anxious to get their hands on a product, thereâ€™s already a Lisa Frank/Glamour Dolls blush brush available for pre-sale: Lisa Frank/Glamour Dolls
